r.d: Package containes locale validation for US such as: * SSN * Postal Code * Regions (States) * Phone Numbers
r.n: * Fix Bug #2394: Validate_US needs updating [busterb] * Fix Bug #5867: Test bug. [davidc] * Fix Bug #11784: running phpcs on US.php highlights 138 errors + 15 warnings [kguest] * Fix Bug #11837: package now uses validate_functions.inc for tests but it is not installed. [kguest] * Implement Feature #6676: just a note about source code comments [davidc] * Implement Feature #6898: Change if empty() then true behavior of Validate_US::phoneNumber() [davidc]
